name: RemoveAttributes
description: Remove indicated attributes or clear all (if not attribute names specified) encoded in the referenced objects's name.

inputParameters.name: ref_obj
inputParameters.description: Referenced curve or line, Guid of curve or line in the active Rhino document.

inputParameters.name: attribute_name
inputParameters.description: The name(s) of the attribute(s) to remove. If None, all attributes will be cleared.

inputParameters.name: update
inputParameters.description: Set to True to apply. Nothing happens if None or False.
